channel.title: windows on …soul, as in software?
channel.description: Recent content in windows on …soul, as in software?

item.title: Catalyst on Windows
item.description: After installing Strawberry Perl run these commands, and may the Gods of ADSL be with you… C:\> cpanp "s conf prereqs 1; s save" C:\> cpanp "s selfupdate all" C:\> cpanp i Win32::Process Catalyst::Devel
